title: Living the Way
description: When a global pandemic wipes out 60% of our population, those that are left must choose between the safety offered by the Church of The Way, or take their chances outside the walls in territories overrun with violent gangs.Anna Cress has seen more than her fair share of questionable practices inside The Church of The Way, and with her Placement Ceremony just one month away, she must quickly decide if the perceived safety of the walls of the compound are worth everything she knows is coming.Anna has spent her life being told the only way to survive this new world is to commit to The Way, but when she and her BFF 4 Life get the chance to step outside the walls, she starts to realize everything she's been told is a lie. Of course it doesn't hurt that she meets a hot piece of man candy in the process.But if everything she suspects is true, will Anna and her friends be able escape or...Join Anna, her BFF, & possibly her future hubby as they discover the truth.WARNING: Language and Abusive themes are present throughout this book
author: Ellie Aiden
